name: i-XyloPhone Fun HD Free
description:
Play along i-XyloPhone for "kids" of all ages! It’s the best Xylophone on the App Store! Try it now: it's FREE and really FUN!!! This app was in the Top20 in US, UK, Russia, China, France, Australia, Spain, Canada, Italy, etc. and featured in the "New & Noteworthy" in several stores!

Compose your songs or play the music game. Two apps in one! Are you ready for this great music experience?

Some features:
* 8 different high quality sound sets (xylophone, marimba, metallophone, glockenspiel, vibraphone, etc.) + Cat & Dog sound sets for your kids.
* Play Music or Play Game modes.
* Learn music with a library of 70 classic songs!
* Customize your music experience with 3 different skins for the xylophone and 6 beautiful backgrounds.
* Supports multitouch and sliding between bars.
* Two difficulty levels to ensure longevity. Music AI to create virtually infinite music compositions for game mode. Each match is new and different!
* Expressly and exclusively designed for the iPad, with a beautiful, immediate and intuitive user interface.
* Record and re-play your composition.
* Solo play feature. Let the iPad express its own creativity composing a song...
* Beautiful graphic in HD.
* Playable for everybody and anybody! Really fun for all ages!
* Do you have additional features/improvements to suggest for the next update? Just contact us!

*** And have fun making your music compositions! ***

Download also our other Music Applications on App Store, some are FREE!

Thanks for using our products. Feedback is always welcome to: support@dighentis.com
App Store reviews are greatly appreciated, thank you.
